description: Plumber's Nightmare is the latest puzzle craze for your Palm Pre and Pixi. You’re a plumber and have been given the job of fixing the pipes for your clients.  They may start off easy, but become a nightmare at the hardest levels. We feature 60 unique handcrafted levels of pipe connecting action. There are 20 Easy, Medium and Hard levels to solve. Lite version lets you play the first 3 of each difficulty. With each level that you complete, you unlock the next one. Save your best time and impress your friends. Select any completed level to see if you can beat your previous time.  It features custom 3D rendered graphics and an eerie soundtrack. You can turn the sound on and off in the preferences menu.  Lite is a trial version of the full game. If you enjoy it, please consider upgrading to the full version. Invasive Bamboo is committed to updating the levels and adding fresh new challenges to this game. Keep your eyes open for new levels and updated features as we enhance Plumber's Nightmare just for you. We listen to your feedback and continue to provide new challenges and features. *Update* critical cross pipe fix
